SEARCH
Package com.riskgame.model

Class GameData

java.lang.Object
com.riskgame.model.Observable
com.riskgame.model.GameData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameData extends Observable implements Serializable
Class holds the data required to maintain the state of the game.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameData

      public GameData()
      Constructor to initialize the game data.

    • GameData

      public GameData(GameMap p_map, String p_mapType, Phase p_gamePhase, Phase p_phase, ArrayList<Player> p_players, Player p_activePlayer, Card p_card, String p_phaseName)
      Constructor to initialize the game data.
      Parameters:
      p_map - Represents the state of the game.
      p_mapType - Domination/Conquest type map
      p_gamePhase - Phase the game is currently in
      p_phase - determine the phase of game
      p_players - List of players involved in the game
      p_activePlayer - Player who's turn is going on
      p_card - Card of cards.
      p_phaseName - its saves the name of the phase
